rule.name: EAP_SetValueForRefProcessWfEntitySheetMapping
rule.description: Rule to set value rule to ref process wf entity sheet mapping
rule.definition:
if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping), null, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping, expression: #"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_8767"( wfEntitySheetMappingId: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!wfEntitySheetMappingId ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].wf_entity_sheet_mapping_id, ri!wfEntitySheetMappingId ), inputCopyId: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!inputCopyId ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].input_copy_id, ri!inputCopyId ), entityColumnName: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!entityColumnName ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].entity_column_name, ri!entityColumnName ), excelColumnIndex: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!excelColumnIndex ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].excel_column_index, ri!excelColumnIndex ), excelColumnType: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!excelColumnType ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].excel_column_type, ri!excelColumnType ), filterOperator:if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!filterOperator ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].filter_operator, ri!filterOperator ), filterGeneration:if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!filterGeneration ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].filter_generation, ri!filterGeneration ), filterValue:if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!filterValue ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].filter_value, ri!filterValue ), pasteFormat: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!pasteFormat ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].paste_format, ri!pasteFormat ), isActive:if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!isActive ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].isactive, ri!isActive ), createdBy: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!createdBy, ),
ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].created_by, ri!createdBy ), createdOn: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!createdOn ),
ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].created_on, ri!createdOn ), modifiedBy: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!modifiedBy ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].modified_by, ri!modifiedBy ), modifiedOn: if( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!modifiedOn ), ri!processSheetWfEntitySheetMapping[fv!index].modified_on, ri!modifiedOn ) ) )
)
